title: Online Business Manager - OBM with experience launching courses/programs
description:
Virtualee & Co is an online business management and implementation agency that empowers overwhelmed Coaches and Founders to scale with clarity, structure, and flow. 



Our all-women power team builds the back-end systems, automations, and processes that free up founders to focus on vision — not chaos. We’re looking for a highly organized, strategic, and proactive Business Manager who thrives in systems, strategy, and execution — someone who can act as a right hand for our clients. You’ll oversee automations, launches, and systems across multiple clients, working closely with founders and our internal team to turn big visions into clear, scalable structures 

If you love building order out of chaos, leading with initiative, and helping businesses grow through smart systems and strong communication — this role is for you. 



Key Responsibilities: 

Operations & Systems 

- Design, document, and optimize workflows, SOPs, and systems that improve efficiency and scalability. 

- Integrate and optimize tools and automations (HubSpot, ClickUp, Kit, 
, Jotform, Zapier, etc.) to streamline operations. 

- Oversee CRM setup, onboarding flows, and backend automations to ensure a seamless client and customer experience. 

- Continuously audit and improve processes to support smooth delivery across all Virtualee client accounts. 



Project Management & Team Management 

- Strategize, manage, and track projects from concept to completion, keeping deliverables on time and aligned with respective goals 

- Create timelines, assign responsibilities, and ensure deadlines are met. ? Anticipate roadblocks and proactively resolve issues. 

- Facilitate communication and coordination between client and tea
mbers (design, tech, assistants) to ensure quality and consistency 

- Lead syncs as needed (preferably weekly or bi-weekly), track progress, and proactively flag risks or bottlenecks. 



Launch & Growth Operations

- Strategize and oversee end-to-end project management for client launches, campaigns, and programs. 

- Coordinate deliverables across team everything from
s, web pages, automations are tested and ready for go-live. 

- Track launch performance (open rates, conversions, revenue) and recommend improvements. 

- Partner with the client and Virtualee leadership to ensure every launch phase — pre-launch, open cart, and post-launch — runs seamlessly. 



Financial & Metrics Oversight 

- Track budgets, hours, and KPIs per client. 

- Review resources, invoices, and forecasts with the leadership team to ensure profitability and alignment. 

- Prepare reports that highlight progress, bottlenecks, and growth opportunities. Strategic Partnership & Vision Implementation 

- Serve as the client’s strategic right hand — translating big-picture goals into actionable project plans and clear execution steps. 

- Anticipate client and team needs and make data-driven recommendations to improve efficiency and impact. 

- Collaborate with Virtualee leadership to evolve agency systems and client experience. 



Qualifications: 

- Proven experience as an Online Business Manager, Operations Manager, or similar leadership role in a digital/online business. 

- Proven experience launching courses, and programs with online coaches + understanding of marketing funnels

- Strong project management and organizational skills, with experience using ClickUp, Asana, or similar tools. 

- Proficiency with CRMs, automation tools, and marketing platforms (HubSpot, Kit, 
, Zapier, etc.). 

- Excellent communication skills and ability to manage remote teams. 

- Financial literacy and experience tracking budgets or KPIs. 

- A self-starter with excellent problem-solving abilities. 

- Comfortable balancing big-picture strategy with day-to-day detail. 

- Experience supporting online launches, digital programs, or marketing campaigns. 



Preferred Skills: 

-  Familiarity with marketing automation and CRM setup. 

- Ability to translate complex systems into clear, visually structured SOPs or dashboards.

- Strong communication skills, both written and verbal. 

- Ability to work independently and collaboratively across multiple projects. 

- Strong understanding of digital marketing strategy and how it connects to operations and growth



Work hours is 1 am to 5 am.



Please submit your CV and include a brief note highlighting your experience supporting coaches, launches, and online programs.

title: Prop Firm Trader (FX / Indices / Crypto)
description:
Hello Traders!



Isla Capital is growing! I’m looking for more disciplined and experienced prop firm traders to join our team and trade evaluation and funded accounts through established prop firms (FTMO, Apex, Alpha Capital Group, or similar). This role is for professionals who understand prop firm rules, manage risk responsibly, and can trade consistently. It will eventually expand into live portfolio management. 



You will:

- Trade prop firm challenge / evals and then funded accounts

- Strictly follow all prop firm rules and drawdown limits

- Maintain daily trade journals

- Provide regular performance updates



Requirements:

-Experience trading prop firm accounts

- Strong risk management and discipline

- Ability to work independently

- Honest, reliable communication

- Understanding of scalping and/or day trading



Compensation:

- Base Salary Pay

- Eval Passing Bonus

- Profit sharing on funded account payouts

- Large Performance Bonuses upon payout Milestones



This is a performance-first setup designed for disciplined traders who want to grow long-term with a serious operation. Our mission is for our filipino traders to earn significant money for themselves and families.   



Important:

- Accounts must be registered under trader’s name due to prop firm rules, but all accounts and profits belong to Isla Capital

- We cover all costs for Prop Firm Evals/Challenges

- Strict confidentiality required



Please apply here and let me know:

- A little bit about you

- Prop firm experience

- Trading style and Psychology



Let's make some money together!

title: Digital Marketing Specialist - E-commerce & Social Media
description:
Full job description

Join Our Team: Crafting Beauty, Inspiring Confidence

At Beautifier LLC, creativity is our foundation, and collaboration is our strength. We're a team of passionate individuals dedicated to pushing the boundaries of beauty, developing products that inspire self-expression and ignite confidence. From personal care essentials to other beauty must-haves, our company has a reputation to be the best in the market.

Digital Marketing Specialist - E-commerce & Social Media

We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Digital Marketing Specialist to optimize and manage our online presence across Amazon, our Shopify website, and key social media channels (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube and
). This role is crucial for driving traffic, increasing conversions, and building brand awareness in a dynamic digital landscape.

Responsibilities

This role will focus on the daily management and optimization of our online presence across various platforms, ensuring a cohesive and high-performing digital marketing strategy.

o Amazon Marketplace Management:

?Create and optimize Product Detail Pages (PDPs) by developing high-quality content, including product titles, descriptions, images, bullet points, and keywords that align with Amazon SEO best practices.

?Monitor product performance, sales rankings, customer reviews, and competitor activity to identify opportunities for improvement.

?Implement and update A+ Content (Enhanced Brand Content) to enhance brand storytelling and product presentation.





o Shopify Website Marketing:

?Develop and execute strategies to drive organic traffic to our Shopify website through SEO and other digital channels.

?Manage website content updates, product merchandising, and user experience optimizations to improve conversion rates.

?Analyze website analytics (e.g., Google Analytics) to identify trends, user behavior, and areas for optimization.

o Social Media & Content Marketing (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube and
):

?Develop creative briefs, stories, and mood boards for all video content.

?Arrange and manage meetings with third-party vendors, such as production companies, to facilitate video creation.

?Develop and implement engaging content strategies for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube to increase brand awareness, engagement, and drive traffic.

?Develop, execute, and optimize paid advertising campaigns on Meta platforms 
/Instagram) using Meta Ads Manager to drive traffic and sales.

?Manage our presence on Meta platforms, utilizing tools like Meta Business Suite for content planning, scheduling, and organic performance tracking.

?Create, schedule, and publish compelling visual and video content tailored to each platform's best practices.

?Monitor social media trends, competitor activities, and audience feedback to refine content strategy.

?Engage with followers, respond to comments, and foster a strong online community.

o General Marketing & Analytics:

?Collaborate with the creative team to develop compelling visual and video assets for all platforms.

?Track, analyze, and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) across all marketing channels.

?Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends, platform updates, and best practices.

Basic Qualifications

?Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field.

?3+ years of professional experience in digital marketing, with a strong focus on Amazon Seller Central and social media platforms.

?Experience in the beauty, cosmetics, or personal care industry.

?Proven experience with Shopify platform management.

?Proven experience with paid social media advertising, specifically on Meta platforms, including campaign setup, audience targeting, and performance analysis.

?Demonstrable experience with social media content creation, scheduling, and community management on Instagram, TikTok, and/or YouTube.

?Hands-on experience with design tools, including Figma and Adobe Photoshop, for creating visual assets.

?Strong understanding of SEO principles and their application across websites and Amazon.

?Proficiency in using marketing analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Amazon Brand Analytics).

?Excellent written and verbal communication skills with an ability to create engaging copy.

?Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

?Bilingual in English and Chinese will be a plus.

Preferred Qualifications

?Familiarity with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut) or AI tools for creating short-form video content.

?Experience with
 marketing platforms.

?Ability to balance creative excellence with strategic business objectives.

?Agility in adapting to rapidly evolving technologies and digital marketing trends.

?A genuine passion for digital marketing and staying ahead of the curve in online consumer behavior.

Work Style

?Self-motivated and able to work independently

?Work Location: Hybrid remote in Philippine & California & China

?Strong time-management and multitasking abilities

?Proactive problem solver with a collaborative mindset





Beautifier Featured Benefits:

?Company paid:

Health, dental, vision, basic life insurance, short and long term disability, and parental leave

?Quarterly company profit sharing opportunity

?Robust Paid Time Off (PTO)

?Paid holidays

?Paid parental leave

?Performance and Safety recognition awards

?Gym reimbursement



Why work at Beautifier?

At Beautifier, our tea
mbers are our smartest investment. In addition to our *dazzling* company culture, associate engagement and recognition initiatives, our benefits package, competitive compensation, and career development opportunities are important ways of showing them that we invest in our employee’s personal and professional success.

Become an integral member of the community to create and maintain a safe, efficient, and responsive work environment and support the Company’s plan to be a desirable workplace. Help build a healthy community whose members share a common goal, accept personal responsibility, earn each other’s respect, excel in their tasks, help each other be successful, participate in the social benefits of being associated with a winning team and Company profits and provide creative, enjoyable opportunities for all.

title: Remote Home Care Recruiter – Full Recruitment System Owner
description:
We are a licensed home care agency serving seniors in Minnesota. We hire caregivers who allow older adults to remain independent in their homes.



We are looking for a full-time remote recruiter with minimum 2 years experience, who will own the entire caregiver recruitment system from start to finish.



This is not a resume-reviewing role.

This is a systems role.



You will:

Forecast hiring needs by geographic area

Manage job postings and applicant flow

Answer incoming applicant phone calls

Screen and qualify candidates

Track pipeline metrics

Ensure we never run short on caregivers in key service areas

You will work directly with leadership, scheduling and HR.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

1. Recruitment System Ownership

Maintain and improve our caregiver recruiting pipeline

Track KPIs: applicants per week, interviews scheduled, hires, cost per hire

Keep weekly recruiting dashboard updated

Identify bottlenecks and fix them



2. Applicant Handling

Answer inbound applicant phone calls (during defined hours)

Conduct structured phone screenings

Schedule interviews

Follow up with incomplete applicants



3. Forecasting & Workforce Planning

Review weekly scheduling data

Identify geographic gaps (city-level forecasting)

Recommend when and where to increase job ads

Anticipate shortages 30–60 days in advance



4. Job Advertising

Post and manage job ads (Indeed,
, local boards)

Test and improve ad copy

Track performance by source



5. Reporting

Weekly hiring report

Pipeline health report

Geographic coverage report



REQUIRED SKILLS

Mastery in English (written and spoken)

Comfortable handling  extensive phone calls daily

Experience recruiting hourly workers (healthcare preferred)

Strong spreadsheet skills (Google Sheets or Excel)

Organized and process-oriented

Comfortable working with metrics and data

Please respond with the word Gemini on the subject line when responding



WHAT WE VALUE

Ownership mentality

Clear communication

No drama, no excuses

Process improvement mindset

Data-driven decisions

title: Experienced Editorial Outreach Specialist
description:
Now Hiring: Experienced Editorial Outreach Specialist

Remote Position | Long-Term Opportunity

Are you an experienced, detail-oriented writer with a strong commitment to producing measurable media results? Are you seeking a stable remote role with long-term growth potential—one that rewards high-quality, publication-ready content and the ability to build strong journalist relationships?

SimplyMedia is seeking a highly skilled Remote Editorial Outreach Specialist to join our expanding team. We are looking for a professional who understands editorial standards and can consistently deliver fast, compelling, and quotable pitches in response to media queries (HARO, Featured, etc.) while cultivating positive journalist relationships.

A writing background and portfolio/sample submissions are required.



What You’ll Receive

* Starting Pay: $450 per month

* Performance Bonuses: Top-performing specialists can advance from $450 to up to $1,000 per month in under six months by meeting our quality and speed KPIs (details provided upon hire).

* Paid Holidays (Philippine Official Holidays) & Paid Time Off: Available after regularization based on consistent, excellent performance.

* Targeted Training Provided: We will train you in our outreach tools and strategies; you must bring the foundational writing ability.

* Annual Bonuses for high-performing tea
mbers.



Who We’re Looking For

* Non-Negotiable: Proven writing experience (1+ years preferred) with the ability to submit a portfolio or relevant writing samples (e.g., media pitches, articles, marketing copy).

* Exceptional Writing Ability: Superb command of written English, strong grammar, and excellent editorial judgment. All outputs must be publication-ready.

* Relationship-Oriented Professional: Experience communicating politely and professionally, with the ability to build long-term rapport with journalists.

* Strategic Thinker: Understanding of media relations, PR strategy, or SEO link building is a significant advantage. You should know how to pitch a compelling angle—not just promote a company.

* Fast, Focused, and Reliable: Ability to respond quickly and deliver high-quality content under tight deadlines (e.g., targeting submission within the first 50 responses).



Key Responsibilities

As a Remote Editorial Outreach Specialist, your primary focus will be generating media coverage through expert communication and strong relationship management:

* Craft Quotable Pitches: Write clear, concise, expert-level responses with strong soundbites and quotable insights reporters can use immediately.

* Strategic Outreach & Follow-Up: Manage query platforms (HARO, Featured, etc.), ensuring fast submissions and timely, professional follow-ups to build journalist relationships.

* Communication Management: Organize, research, and respond to media correspondence with clarity, professionalism, and a focus on maintaining positive rapport.

This is a long-term, fully remote position focused on content quality, measurable media outcomes, and professional relationship building.?Regularization to permanent status is based on consistently excellent performance.



If You’re a Dependable, Skilled Writer Who Thrives Under Pressure—We Want to Hear from You

Multiple positions available. 



Leave us a message first, then apply here:

What We’re Looking For

title: Amazon PPC Manager - PPC Specialist for EU + UK Marketplace - 5 product categories
description:
We’re a fast-growing eCommerce brand with our own warehouse and factory in the Netherlands. 2-3x year on year growth for 5 years straight with 100k+ customers.



We sell houseplant-specific products across Europe and are now scaling our Amazon EU + UK hard.



Amazon is a new & critical growth channel for us, and we’re looking for someone to take full ownership of the advertising. We have proven D2C success & promising early traction on Amazon.



Our Mission

At Sybotanica, a small, high-growth startup, we wake up every day to make plants happy! To do that, we need to act fast, take ownership, and take pride in our work as a team.

If we succeed, we’ll become Europe’s #1 houseplant brand, and we’ll know we’ve made it when we can proudly call 500,000 plant lovers our customers.

You will be working closely with the founder & our supply chain team and the rest of our 20-person team (including 10 PH-based employees).



Working Hours: available during EU business hours (08:00–17:00 Amsterdam time), is midday / evening PH hours. 





What You’ll Be Responsible For



You own the Amazon P&L and are responsible for the ad performance.

1. Advertising / PPC (Amazon Ads)

- Build and manage Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display campaigns for our 4 main product categories across 5 countries.

- Set up campaign structure, keyword research, negative keyword pruning

- Daily optimization: bid adjustments, search term reports, ACOS/TACOS monitoring

- Budget allocation per country and per SKU



2. Ad-hoc catalogue management

- Since amazon is a new channel, you will manage catalogue management in collaboration with our supply team for the time being.



(Note: Inventory & supply chain is owned by our Supply Chain Manager, you will coordinate, not own this)



Requirements (Read Carefully, No Exceptions)

- Amazon marketplace experience is a must, D2C brand experience strongly preferred

- Proof required, don’t just claim experience, show it.

- You’re excited to work in a fast-moving, remote-friendly team where ownership and initiative are valued.



Perks & Benefits

- 13th-month pay (pro-rated if yearly)

- Flexible work hours (parttime also possible)

- Raises based on KPI targets every 6–12 months

- 20 paid leave days per year

- Real-life team events with our PH team!

- Innovative company, AI-Integrated.

- Supportive and collaborative team environment! 





How to Apply

- Send a short message explaining:

- The proof outlined above. The more the better.

- A time you solved a tough Amazon challenge, the more details the better

- Detailed specifications of size of Amazon account(s) handled, annual revenue, adspend, which marketplaces, what parts you were responsible for + results you delivered.

- Your CV in .PDF

- What motivates you





Add “lets gro w” so I know you read the whole thing. Also add a ????somewhere.

title: Sales Representative (REMOTE)
description:
IMPACT BRANDS is a leading contributor to the health and wellness industry. With a journey from 5 to over 400 colleagues, and the expansion to a diverse family of 7+ brands (PureHealth Research, Nation Health MD, Pureance, Trumeta, PetMade, VitalPeak, Nature's Blast). We are dedicated to helping improve the lives of people all over the world.

At IMPACT BRANDS, we embrace remote work culture and cherish open-mindedness, high energy, and adaptability qualities that are essential in our dynamic environment. We prioritize the growth of every tea
mber, regardless of their location, offering advancement from intern to leadership roles.



IMPACT BRANDS has already positively impacted the lives of 3 million people worldwide. Join us as a remote Outbound Sales Representative and let’s impact billions together!



Our Treats:

- Welcome Gift. Experience a warm welcome with our exclusive present designed just for you.

- Remote work. We are a fully remote organization, allowing you to work from any location.

- More free time. Enjoy 15+ Working Days of Holidays to recharge and relax from work.

- Internet subsidy. To ensure seamless communication and access to remote work we will assist you with an additional budget for high-speed internet.

- Health and wellness budget. We value your well-being - investment in your health is not just encouraged but actively supported.

- Birthday Gift. Celebrate your special day with additional time-off.

- Team spirit. Enjoy regular team-building activities and engaging online events.

- Professional growth. Exceptional performance is recognized and rewarded, offering opportunities for career advancement based on your contributions to our success.

- Volunteering. Embrace the opportunity to dedicate 2 paid days each year towards personal growth and community impact.

- Permanent contract. Enjoy stability with long-term growth opportunities.

- Global flatwork culture. The chance to influence the company right from the start and foster collaboration across borders.

- A whole bunch of other benefits.



Bits of your job:

- Perform a high volume of outbound sales calls to customers to interact with them and identify their needs or issues

- Clarify information and provide recommendations and solutions to customers via telephone calls

- Build positive work relationships with customers to enhance the image and public perception of a company

- Strive to improve customer satisfaction through excellent customer service

- Place outbound calls to customers to promote new products and services

- Complete call notes and call reports as necessary and update them in the database

- Obtain and evaluate all relevant data to handle complaints and inquiries

- Keep a high level of knowledge about existing products and services

- And other tasks



Key expectations:

- Previous experience in B2C Sales, including managing outbound and cold call functions

- Medical or healthcare industry experience would be considered a plus

- Strong phone presence with exemplary customer service and sales skills

- Excellent communication skills with active listening

- Customer focus and adaptability to different personality types

- Strong problem-solving and excellent interpersonal skills

- Ability to multi-task, set priorities, and manage time effectively

- Ability to handle stressful situations appropriately

- Excellent written and verbal English language skills

- Proficient in relevant computer applications



Base salary of $500-$750 per month, plus commission based on performance, with potential earnings of $1300+ per month.

title: Operations Assistant
description:
PART-TIME OPERATIONS ASSISTANT (VIRTUAL ASSISTANT)

Location: Remote

Hours: 20 hours per week



PLEASE READ THE FULL DESCRIPTION AND FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS AT THE BOTTOM TO APPLY.



* Are you highly organised and love keeping things running smoothly?

* Do you enjoy supporting events, people, and operations behind the scenes?

* Do you get satisfaction from ticking off tasks and staying one step ahead?

* Are you comfortable working remotely with clear systems and processes?



If you answered YES to all four -- keep reading.



--- BENEFITS ---



* Competitive pay: $450 USD (20 hrs a week)

* Medical insurance: After probation period

* 13th Month Bonus Pay: Pro-rated

* Paid Leave: Pro-rated annual leave and sick leave

* Work from home: Permanently

* A fully systemised business (no guesswork)

* Detailed onboarding and training

* Recognition, rewards, and support

* A strong, values-driven culture

* Join a Great Place To Work (R) Certified company



--- WHAT A TYPICAL WEEK MIGHT LOOK LIKE ---



* Assisting with planning and coordination of upcoming events

* Researching venues, suppliers, and travel options

* Updating calendars, itineraries, and internal records

* Reviewing job applications and managing job ads

* Supporting onboarding and offboarding tasks

* Coordinating culture initiatives and team activities

* Organising gifts, awards, and operational reminders

* General operational and admin support



--- REQUIREMENTS ---



To be successful in this role, you must have:



* Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant, Operations Assistant, or Admin Assistant

* Strong organisational and time management skills

* Excellent written and spoken English

* High attention to detail and accuracy

* Experience using Google Suite

* Confidence using project management tools (ClickUp or similar)

* Ability to follow procedures and work independently

* A proactive and reliable work ethic



--- ABOUT APB ---



The Association of Professional Builders (APB) is a business coaching and training company for custom home builders around the world. We provide systems, training, and coaching that genuinely change lives and businesses. We are a growing, remote-first team and proudly certified as a Great Place To Work Australia.



OUR CORE VALUES:



* We never make assumptions; we ask more questions

* We always do the right thing

* We celebrate the wins

* We don't take things personally

* We make decisions and own the result

* We are impeccable with our word

* We trust but verify



--- HOW TO APPLY ---



STEP 1: Record a Loom video (max 3 minutes) answering: "Can you tell us about your background and experience as an Operations Assistant, Virtual Assistant, or in a similar role?" (Ensure we can see and hear you clearly).



STEP 2: Submit your application via OnlineJobs.ph with:



* Your resume

* A cover letter

* Your Loom video link



STEP 3: Research the Association of Professional Builders to prepare for your interview.



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

description:

You'll report directly to the Manager, handle tasks as assigned, and work closely with designers, crew, dispatch, and leadership to keep everything running smoothly. This is a supportive role in a collaborative, fast-paced team—perfect for someone proactive, detail-oriented, and calm under pressure.

 & VOIP phone (warm, professional tone)

mbers

s

title: Reddit Account Creator & Infrastructure Operator
description:

Set up username, avatar, bio properly



Verify
 securely

title: Full-Stack Developer (Next.js + Supabase + React Native/Expo)
description:
Full-Stack Developer (Next.js + Supabase + React Native/Expo)



Type: Full-time | Service-for-Fees Contract | Paid Weekly

Hours: 40 hrs per week

Location: Remote (PH preferred — and outside Metro Manila even better)

Timezone: Must overlap with AEST (Brisbane, UTC+10)

Start: ASAP

Project: A fun multi-tenant SaaS platform almost in production



Working style



You’ll collaborate with a hands-on founder and AI pair-programming (Claude Code / ChatGPT).

Please be comfortable working with vibe coders — exploratory and iterative builders — while maintaining proper engineering discipline (tests, RLS checks, targeted diffs, and idempotent SQL).



We work in small, safe PRs, favouring clarity, maintainability, and a real sense of progress.

This is a long-term, stable full-time role with weekly payments.



Tech you’ll touch



Web: Next.js 15 (App Router), React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind 4



Mobile: React Native + Expo, TypeScript



Backend/Data: Supabase (Postgres, RLS, Realtime, Edge Functions)



Schema examples: cleaning tasks, reservations, properties, task activity log, task types, user roles, materialised views



Ops: GitHub, CSV exports; future integrations (Xero, WebSockets, storage uploads)



Your first months



Stabilise and extend the Next.js + Supabase coordinator app



Polish the Expo + React Native cleaners app (camera, checklist, GPS, offline queue)



Strengthen RLS policies, clean SQL migrations, and improve performance/pagination



Ship planned PRs with clear acceptance criteria, testing, and rollback notes



Must-haves



Strong TypeScript and production experience with Next.js or React Native



Solid knowledge of Supabase/Postgres (RLS, policies, migrations, RPC)



Habit of slicing work into small, reviewable PRs



Proactive communication and autonomy



Nice-to-haves



Expo camera/image workflows, retry queues, offline sync



iCal parsing, real-time channels, S3 uploads with GPS metadata



Xero API, Playwright tests, Sentry



How to apply (important)



 

 with subject “Full-Stack Application – [Your Name]”

and include:



GitHub or portfolio links



A short note about an RLS or auth/session bug you’ve solved



Your compensation expectations as described below



Compensation expectations



For this full-time role and shift pattern, state your expected monthly remuneration under a service-for-fees agreement (not employment).



If you are based in the Philippines, please consider your local obligations as a service provider.

Typical costs to factor in may include:



Retirement / pension contributions

Health contributions

Occupational risk (ARL)

Income tax (varies with annual income)

Leave and public holidays are not paid under this agreement — please factor these into your fee



Include these costs when you state your expected monthly rate.

title: Outbound Sales Rep (Warm Leads) – Call-First – Part-Time (Can Become Full-Time) – High-Ticket Consulting
description:
We’re a strategy and management consulting business selling a high-ticket offer to qualified prospects. Leads come in from social media ads (warm leads). Your job is to call leads quickly, qualify them, handle basic objections, set appointments, and pre-close so the call is high quality.

If you can sound confident on the phone, follow a script without sounding robotic, and you’re consistent with follow-up, you’ll do well here.

WHAT YOU’LL DO

- Call warm leads from social media ads (call-first workflow)

-Run discovery and qualification (pain, goals, timeline, budget, decision maker)

-Handle common objections (timing, price, “need to think”)

-Book qualified appointments on our calendar

-Pre-close by confirming fit, commitment, and next steps before the call

-Follow up consistently until the lead books or disqualifies

-Update CRM/Google Sheet with accurate notes and status

SUCCESS METRICS (KPIs)

-Speed-to-lead: fast response to new leads

-Contact rate: how many leads you reach

-Qualified appointments booked per week

-Show rate and qualified show rate

-Quality of notes and handoff to the closer

REQUIREMENTS

-Strong spoken English (clear, confident, natural)

-Sales experience in appointment setting / outbound calling

-Comfortable being on the phone daily (call-first)

-Organized follow-up habits (you don’t forget leads)

-Coachable and able to follow scripts and feedback

BONUS IF YOU HAVE

-High-ticket consulting/coaching sales experience

-CRM experience (GoHighLevel, HubSpot, Close, Pipedrive, etc.)

-Experience calling leads from paid ads or inbound forms

TOOLS YOU MAY USE

-Zoho CRM + 

-Calendly 

-Dialer / Cloudtalk and dialpad

COMPENSATION

- Base pay + performance bonuses (based on qualified appointments and/or revenue contribution)

SCHEDULE

-Part-time to start: 20 hours/week

-Potential full-time: 40 hours/week (based on results)

-Call-first means you must be responsive during business hours for new leads and follow-ups

Timezone: EST

WHY THIS ROLE IS GREAT

-Warm leads from social media ads (not cold lists all day)

-Proven offer and simple process

-Clear pathway to full-time and growth into closer or team lead

OW TO APPLY (IMPORTANT)

Reply with the following, in order:

A short intro + your relevant sales experience

Your internet speed + headset info

A 60–90 second voice recording link answering:

Why are you a great fit for call-first warm lead appointment setting and pre-closing?

Answer this roleplay prompt in writing (6–10 lines):

Lead says: “This sounds interesting, but I’m not sure it’s the right time.”

Write your response.

title: Technical Support Specialist
description:

• Serve as the first point of contact for technical support inquiries from NDIS service providers and users of our software platform.

• Create and maintain knowledge base articles, user guides, and training materials specific to NDIS software functions.





• Educate and train clients on software updates, new features, and best practices for NDIS reporting and billing.

• Stay current with updates to NDIS policies, price guides, and compliance standards, and ensure clients are supported accordingly.

title: Tax and Administrative Assistant
description:
Tax & Administrative Assistant – Small Tax Firm (Remote)



We are a growing, high-standard tax and accounting firm seeking a detail-oriented, proactive, and resourceful Tax & Administrative Assistant to support both tax preparation and daily operations.



This is a hands-on role inside a fast-paced practice. The right candidate is organized, dependable, and comfortable taking ownership of tasks without constant direction.



Core Responsibilities

mber.

Long-term position with growth potential.

title: SKU & Systems Operations Manager
description:
About the Role



We are looking for a highly detail-oriented SKU & Systems Manager to own and manage our SKU structure, system data integrity, pricing logic, invoicing accuracy, and sales channel operations across B2C and B2B.



This role is not focused on physical inventory handling, but on ensuring that all systems, invoices, SKUs, pricing, and integrations are accurate, aligned, and scalable across Shopify, ShipHero, 3PLs, and distributors.



You will act as the single source of truth for SKU data, pricing, orders, and system accuracy as we grow.



Key Responsibilities

1. SKU Master Data & Systems Ownership (Core Responsibility)

•Own and manage SKU master data across all systems, including:

•SKU codes & naming conventions

•Case packs & inner packs

•HS codes

•Product dimensions & weights

•Product categories & variants

•Ensure strict accuracy and consistency of SKU data across:

•Shopify

•ShipHero

•CIN7 (current or future implementation)

•3PL and distributor systems

•Validate all data before system entry with a zero-error mindset

•Manage SKU setup for:

-New product launches

-Bundles, kits, and special configurations

-US vs Canada SKUs



2. Systems & Integrations Management

•Own and manage system integrations between:

-Shopify

-ShipHero

-CIN7 (implementation & optimization – medium term)

•Define and enforce system rules:

-Unit vs case logic

-MOQ rules

-Bundles and kits

•Troubleshoot system discrepancies related to:

-SKUs

-Orders

-Pricing

-Invoices



3. Pricing & Sales Channel Management (High Emphasis)

•Build, maintain, and validate pricing structures across:

-B2C (Shopify, Amazon if applicable)

-Retail partners

-Distributors

-US vs Canada markets

•Enforce pricing rules by channel:

-MSRP

-Wholesale tiers

-Distributor margins

-Support B2C USA channel setup and ongoing operations

-Ensure pricing accuracy across all sales and order systems



4. Invoice Accuracy & Financial Coordination

•Ensure invoice accuracy across:

-Client invoices

-ShipHero invoices

-3PL-related charges

•Cross-check invoices against:

-Orders

-Pricing rules

-Case pack logic

-Shipping and fulfillment data

•Partner closely with Finance / Account Controller on:

-COGS accuracy

-Landed cost validation

-Margin checks

-Flag discrepancies immediately and drive resolution



5. Order Management & Fulfillment Coordination (B2B & B2C)

•Create and manage B2B distributor orders in the system

•Validate all orders for:

-Correct SKUs

-Pricing accuracy

-Case pack logic

-Fulfillment rules

•Prepare and coordinate deliveries, including:

-Shopify draft listings (when needed)

-Preparing deliveries for Universal based on upcoming containers

•Coordinate closely with Tandem (Canada warehouse / 3PL) regarding:

-Order releases

-SKU setup

-System alignment



6. Issue Escalation & Ownership

•Act as the primary escalation point for:

-SKU issues

-Pricing discrepancies

-Order and invoice errors

-System mismatches

•Serve as the main point of contact for:

-Canada 3PL (Tandem)

-System-related concerns

•Ensure all issues are:

-Documented

-Tracked

-Resolved efficiently



Qualifications & Experience:

•Proven experience in systems, operations, or inventory-related management roles

•Strong experience with:

-Shopify

-ERP / inventory systems (CIN7, NetSuite, TradeGecko, or similar)

-3PL system coordination (e.g., ShipHero)

-Experience supporting both B2B and B2C sales channels

-Strong numerical, analytical, and reconciliation skills

-Highly process-driven and structured

-Exceptional attention to detail and data accuracy



Key Traits for Success:

•Extremely detail-oriented (“nothing slips through” mindset)

•Strong systems and data ownership mentality

•Comfortable managing SKUs, pricing logic, and invoices

•Proactive problem solver

•Able to work cross-functionally with Operations, Finance, Sales, and 3PL partners

•Thrives in a fast-growing, scaling environment

title: Customer Support / Account Manager (CSM) needed for Fashion Software Company!
description:
Hey!



We’re looking for a sharp, self-managed Customer Success Manager to help us with supporting and onboarding our customers in Slack and also video call onboarding sessions where you'll walk them through the product and answer their questions. You’ll be the bridge between our customers and our product, making sure clients feel genuinely supported, bugs get squashed fast, and nothing important falls through the cracks.



We’re a lean, fast-moving SaaS helping fashion brands streamline their operations. You’ll need to be comfortable owning your role, learning a new industry, and thinking on your feet.



Who We’re Looking For

• Fluent English and a clear accent — you’ll be on client calls, so confidence matters.

• Proactive and resourceful — you don’t wait for instructions, you solve problems.

• Willing to learn our platform and understand the fashion supply chain — this isn’t a plug-and-play role.

• Able to juggle multiple time zones (US hours required and EU - AUS/NZ coverage is a bonus).

• Smart and organized — you can prioritize tickets, work with devs, and improve systems, not just follow SOPs.



What You’ll Be Doing

• Own customer onboarding — guide new clients through setup, training, and adoption to ensure they get value fast.

• Deliver fast support — respond to client chats quickly (mostly US/EU hours).

• Join daily dev standups — flag bugs, push priority fixes, and keep clients informed.

• Triage and track issues in Linear — keep everything clean, clear, and up to date.

• Help build our knowledge base — deeply learn the product and help document it in plain, helpful language.

• Follow up with customers — check in regularly, resolve concerns, and pitch upgrades (20% commission on upsells).



How to Apply



Send a short message including:

1. Why you’re a great fit for a high-velocity startup like ours.

2. A real example of how you handled a tough client or bug situation.

3. Your hourly rate and weekly availability.



>>>Best applicants should record a quick 5min Loom explaining their experience, and also share their MBTI if known



If you’re dependable, detail-obsessed, and ready to grow with a SaaS company that moves fast and builds smart, I want to hear from you!

title: Outreach Sales Representative - Primarily Linkedin and Facebook
description:

This is a long-term remote position with performance bonuses and career progression such as the opportunity to become a Sales Manager.

Additional commission structure available ($10 bonus for each converted lead).

Healthcare cover 

25 days paid annual leave 



About the Role:

You will be reaching out to tradespeople such as plumbers, electricians, builders, and cleaners via various social media platforms. Your goal is to start genuine conversations, explain the value of our software, and encourage them to start a free trial.



Key Responsibilities:

Cold messaging and outreach on various social media platforms

Booking calls with potential clients and showcasing our platform*

Researching and identifying trades businesses

Personalising messages rather than spamming

Following up with leads

Logging outreach and results in a simple tracker

Suggesting improvements to scripts and targeting



*Training will be provided on our company and software.



KPIs (Monthly Targets)

15–25 qualified free-trial signups 

Consistent daily outreach activity

Accurate tracking of leads and conversations

Improving response rates over time



Requirements:

Proven experience in cold outreach or lead generation for new companies

Strong written English and clear communication

Comfortable starting conversations with strangers

Reliable internet and availability for up to 30 hours per week

Honest, organised, and self-motivated

Experience with SaaS or CRM tools is a bonus

Comfortable speaking to potential customers via video call



Ideal Candidate:

Has worked with startups before

Understands outreach is conversation, not spam

Wants long-term work with performance bonuses

Comfortable suggesting better messaging strategies

title: WordPress Developer – Structured SEO Build with Custom Post Types (Scalable Architecture) – Fixed Price
description:
I am building a structured WordPress website focused on Australian high-risk work licenses and role-based compliance ticket bundles.



The project priorities:



• Clean SEO architecture

• Scalable internal structure

• Performance

• Logical content hierarchy



Design should be clean and professional. Heavy visual effects are not required.



The objective is to create a lightweight, well-structured WordPress foundation that supports long-term content growth and lead generation.



Core SEO Architecture Model summary below:



The website must follow a clear hub-and-cluster structure.



Top-level sections:



/tickets/

/bundles/

/states/

/providers/

/guides/



Each section must support scalable expansion and internal linking.



URL Structure Requirements



Examples:



Tickets



/tickets/forklift-licence/

/tickets/forklift-licence/wa/

/tickets/ewp-ticket/

/tickets/dogging-licence/



Bundles (Role-Based)

/bundles/shutdown-trade-assistant/

/bundles/shutdown-rigger/

/bundles/nz-to-au-recognition/



States

/states/wa/

/states/nsw/

/states/Qld/

/states/vic/

/states/nt/

/states/tas/

/states/sa/



Territories

/territory/NT/

/territory/ACT/



Providers

/providers/provider-name/

/providers/wa/

/providers/nsw/

etc



Guides

/guides/hrwl-renewal-process/

/guides/ewp-over-11m-explained/

etc



This hierarchy must be implemented cleanly and logically.



i.e Required Architecture

Custom Post Types:

1) Tickets



Fields:

– Overview

– Requirements

– Cost

– State variations

– Related tickets

– CTA



Must support nested state & territory pages.



2) Bundles (Role-Based Compliance Sets)



– Relationship field linking to Tickets

– Structured layout for grouping

– Internal linking capability



3) Providers Directory



Fields:

– Name

– Location

– Courses offered

– Contact details

– CTA button



Optional taxonomy by state/territory.



Internal Linking Expectations



The sites structure must support:



• Tickets linking to related tickets

• Tickets linking to state pages

• Bundles linking to relevant tickets

• State pages linking to tickets and providers



Breadcrumb structure required:



Home > Tickets > Forklift Licence > WA etc and so forth 



SEO & Technical Requirements



• Lightweight theme (GeneratePress, Astra, Kadence or similar)

• No heavy proprietary builder lock-in

• Minimal plugins

• Clean permalink structure

• Breadcrumbs enabled

• XML sitemap

• Basic schema

• Mobile-first responsive design

• Fast load speed



Tracking & Conversion



• Google Analytics (GA4) installed

• Google Search Console connected

• Lead capture form (“Find a Course”)

•
 capture form

• Thank-you page



Layout & Design Direction



Design should be:



• Clean

• Minimal

• Professional

• Trust-oriented



Not flashy or heavily stylised.



Colour direction:



Primary: Deep navy / dark slate blue

Secondary (CTA): Industrial amber / muted orange

Neutral: White base with light grey section backgrounds



Typography should be modern and highly readable (e.g., Inter, Open Sans, Montserrat).



No heavy animations or complex visual effects required.



Mandatory Requirements



To be considered:



Include a link to your LinkedIn profile for customer review.



Provide at least 3 WordPress portfolio examples.



Confirm experience building Custom Post Types.



Briefly explain how you would implement the hub-and-cluster URL structure described above.



Define your anticipated build time. Quality beats speed - and I want this meticulously executed. 



Any proposals missing the above will not be reviewed.



This is a firm order to place asap.. 



Thanks,

Chris
